name: The Manor (Ⓔⓡⓘⓒ)
description:
[CURRENTLY IN BETA]

The Manor is a point-and-click puzzle game where you visit a manor to uncover dark family secrets.

Set-Up

  • Download the game
  • Unzip TheManorPC.zip
  • Run "TheManor"

How to play

  • Click on the ground  to move
  • Click on things to  interact with them
  • Click on the bag to open and close the inventory
  • Click on the items in the inventory to select them, then click on something else to use the item on it. (Active item is highlighted in yellow).

Game Created By

  • Jordan
  • Garrett
  • Kylie
  • Zoe
  • Eric Gritz
  • Eric Krawczyk
